rules_text:
Hexproof
Whenever you draw a card, if it’s the third card you’ve drawn this turn, Aquatic Whisperer can’t be blocked this turn.
notes:
2k17
Islandwalk > Hexproof
target land becomes an Island in addition to it’s other types until end of turn > Aquatic Whisperer can’t be blocked until end of turn

fluffy: until end of turn —> this turn (Gearseeker Serpent)
